headline: Ethereum is trading below the $2,300 mark after failing to hold key demand levels last week. The price has faced a series of rejections at this level, suggesting that it may be forming a new support level. Analysts are keeping a close eye on the crypto market as it continues to experience wild fluctuations.
content:
Ethereum is trading below the $2,300 mark after failing to hold key demand levels last week. The price has faced a series of rejections at this level, suggesting that it may be forming a new support level. Analysts are keeping a close eye on the crypto market as it continues to experience wild fluctuations.

XRP has remained relatively stable in 2025 despite the uncertain market conditions where several large-cap assets have floundered. However, the crypto market remains volatile, and the price is still subject to significant fluctuations. Analysts are watching the XRP price closely as it continues to form a new range.

The Bitcoin price has been trading within
